name: Trump's Pizza Restaurant Dash - 2016 Election on the Run Wall Cooking Game!
name_original: Trump's Pizza Restaurant Dash - 2016 Election on the Run Wall Cooking Game!
description:
Does Donald Trump have what it takes to run this pizza shop?

How about Hillary or Bernie?

Play a super fun new Pizza Dash game with a political twist!!

Make pizzas quickly or your customers will get angry and leave your store!!

Have soooo much fun!
